link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: "Net Demand and Time Liabilities as on last Friday" should be greater than equal to 0.
"Subject to CRR" should be greater than equal to 0.
"Exempted to CRR" should be greater than equal to 0.
"Amount of Cash Reserves Required to be maintained" should be greater than equal to 0.
"Average cash reserves required to be maintained" should be greater than or equal to 0.
"Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI" should always be greater than or equal to 0.
Reporting of " 'Dates for Fortnight" is mandatory.
Identity " Value of Subject to CRR ( Subject to CRR = Net Demand and Time Liabilities as on last Friday - Exempted from CRR )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of 'Col 3 as a % of Col. 2 (in%)' ( 'Col 3 as a % of Col. 2 (in%)' = Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI / Average cash reserves required to be maintained )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Excess or Shortfall (Excess or Shortfall = Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI - Average cash reserves required to be maintained )" do not tally.

Identity " Value of 'Total Col 3 as a % of Col. 2 (in%)' ( 'Total Col 3 as a % of Col. 2 (in%)' = Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI / Average cash reserves required to be maintained )" do not tally.

Identity " Value of 'Average Col 3 as a % of Col. 2 (in%)' ( 'Average Col 3 as a % of Col. 2 (in%)' = Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI / Average cash reserves required to be maintained )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Total Excess or Shortfall (Total Excess or Shortfall = Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI - Average cash reserves required to be maintained )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Average Excess or Shortfall (Average Excess or Shortfall = Cash Balances Actually maintained with RBI - Average cash reserves required to be maintained )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Total of average cash reserves required to be maintained (Total of average cash reserves required to be maintained = Sum of all its child elements )" do not tally.

Identity " Value of 'Average value for average cash reserves required to be maintained' ('Average value for average cash reserves required to be maintained' = Average of values for 14 days )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Total cash balances Actually maintained with RBI (Total cash balances Actually maintained with RBI = Sum of all its child elements )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of 'Average value for cash Balances actually maintained by RBI' ('Average value for cash Balances actually maintained by RBI' = Average of values for 14 days )" do not tally.
CRR rate prescribed by RBI and calculated in the return should be equal.

Inequality " Value of 'Amount of Cash Reserves Required to be Maintained' ('Amount of Cash Reserves Required to be Maintained' <> Net Liabilites subject to CRR * CRR percentage prescribed by RBI )" do not tally.
